messages.title: Your Candidate for Dulwich and West Norwood
messages.content: "After 10 years of Tory & Lib Dem cuts we need urgent change. Labour will provide a Final Say on Brexit, invest in King's College Hospital, reverse the cuts to our schools, tackle the climate emergency and build the genuinely affordable homes we need."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will provide a Final Say on Brexit.
Reverse the cuts to our schools.
Build the genuinely affordable homes we need.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will provide a Final Say on Brexit.
issues.education: Reverse the cuts to our schools.

housing.content: Build the genuinely affordable homes we need.

leaflet.personalStatement: After 10 years of Tory & Lib Dem cuts we need urgent change.

images.caption: Helen Hayes holding an EU flag in front of the Houses of Parliament.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet was promoted by Andy Simmons on behalf of Helen Hayes both at Dulwich and West Norwood Labour Party, with specific address and printing information.
